content: {"name": "North Gwinnett Cooperative Ministry ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serving zip codes: 30011, 30517, 30515, 30519, 30548, 30518, 30024", "email": "", "url": "northgwinnettcoop.org/services", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4395 Commerce Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Buford", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30518", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 34.0989524, "longitude": -84.00827319999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 271-9793", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "23:00", "closes_at": "01:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "21:30", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "21:30", "closes_at": "23:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Copy of photo ID: Medicaid/food stamp or section"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social security cards or Birth certificates for every member of the household"}]}
